About that... in the last story page (p53) Miyuki said, in the beginning, Ichiro told them their holes belong to his dick, thus she made it so (he didn't thought it would end up like this). Tried checking back to volume 1 but can't find that line. Anyone got idea of which part she refers to? A fun thing is, like this time, he doesn't always got away unscathed. In Mesmerism volume 6 extra, he hit on the milf from Summer Halation while Shouko (the heroine from Mesmerism) is pregnant. She sucked him dry and he came back crying to Shouko.
part 3 is already translated in spanish in others sites pls cmon !
@minminazusa nice nice. I only know the part that Miyuki somehow can make Ichiro not to cum

The plot twist. Ichiro and Miyuki made their revenge. They put the father into a trance and he also taught Miyuki some hypnosis to keep the father that way. The other man is Miyuki's uncle. He told her, since the father's corruption is exposed, the board would fire him soon. The school is originally Miyuki's mother's, so they will make sure the sisters' livelyhood is protected. Ichiro planned on taking his exit now to avoid problem. He got name list of the guests he can blackmail for money too. Before parting, Miyuki invites him to her room, and said she want to try the hypnosis he taught her. Ichiro didn't think it would work, but now he can't cum without Miyuki's permission. It's going to be a lasting relationship there :D In the extra 2koma, seems like Miyuki is already pregnant and they're living together.
a comeback from Ichiro-san. yea boi
